column2: These are four schools of magic which has been performed by wise wizards for centuries. The time has come for me to choose one of them. Before I achieve adulthood I am allowed to change my mind, however if I wanted to change my school without mastering once I become an adult, it would be great shame.

These are four schools of magic which has been performed by wise wizards for centuries. I should choose one of them and make an attempt to master it. It would be great shame if I tried to change my school as an adult.
School of the wisest wizards, the Arcane magic.
Magic of Teuperion and Laurelin, the Light side of magic.
Or maybe I will join the the Dark side of magic
Hamon, the school centered around controlling of one's own body
Every ritualistic character might try to learn and master a magic
